data.title: $150 for a 1 mm^2 silicon photonic chip
data.meta_description: As part of the edX course on silicon photonics, we are now offering the option to have a chip fabricated and delivered to you. Participants can purchase a 1 mm^2 design area on a 2 mm small chip, for $150 + shipping.
data.text:
As part of the edX course on silicon photonics, we are now offering the option to have a chip fabricated and delivered to you.

Participants can purchase a 1 mm^2 design area on a 2 mm small chip, for $150 + shipping.

Why are we doing this?

We believe that getting a chip in-hand and doing your own testing is an extremely valuable experience. There are challenges associated with building or obtaining an experimental setup, aligning the optical fibres, etc. We hope that this chip can provide people with a rapid entry into the field.

What if you don't have access to experimental facilities?

No problem. The edX course includes a big chip fabricated with all participant designs, and we will test the entire chip. So everyone will receive measurement data for their designs.

Details:
